codeSystems.name: DICOM Controlled Terminology Definitions
codeSystems.description: DICOM Code Definitions (Coding Scheme Designator "DCM" Coding Scheme Version "01")

codeSystems.name: RequestIntent
codeSystems.title: RequestIntent
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a request.

codeSystems.name: RequestStatus
codeSystems.title: RequestStatus
codeSystems.description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

codeSystems.name: TaskStatus
codeSystems.title: TaskStatus
codeSystems.description: The current status of the task.

codeSystems.name: SNOMED_CT
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT (all versions)
codeSystems.description: SNOMED CT is the most comprehensive and precise clinical health terminology product in the world, owned and distributed around the world by The International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).

codeSystems.name: ActReason
codeSystems.title: ActReason
codeSystems.description:
A set of codes specifying the motivation, cause, or rationale of an Act, when such rationale is not reasonably represented as an ActRelationship of type "has reason" linking to another Act.

*Examples:* Example reasons that might qualify for being coded in this field might be: "routine requirement", "infectious disease reporting requirement", "on patient request", "required by law".

codeSystems.name: HCParty
codeSystems.title: BeCdHcParty
codeSystems.https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7-be/core//V: List of health care parties in Belgium

codeSystems.name: BeCommunicationCode
codeSystems.title: BeCommunicationCode
codeSystems.description: Communication codes in Belgium. To define a specific method of communicating. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

codeSystems.name: BeTempRequestedService
codeSystems.title: BeTempRequestedService
codeSystems.description: Temporary codes for indicating services that can be requested from a Nurse

codeSystems.name: BeTempRequestedServiceDetail
codeSystems.title: BeTempRequestedServiceDetail
codeSystems.description: Temporary codes for indicating service details that can be requested from a Nurse

codeSystems.name: BePrescriptionProposalType
codeSystems.title: BePrescriptionProposalType
codeSystems.description: Prescription Proposal Type. Indicates the type of proposal (new or prolongation) as from the uses cases by NIHDI

codeSystems.name: BePrescriptionStatusReason
codeSystems.title: BePrescriptionStatusReason
codeSystems.description: Status reason for the prescription. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

codeSystems.name: BeTreatmentStatusReason
codeSystems.title: BeTreatmentStatusReason
codeSystems.description: Status reason for the treatment. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

codeSystems.name: BeContrastFluidUse
